state: You are hungry! Let's cook a delicious meal. Check the cookbook in the kitchen for the recipe. Once done, enjoy your meal! -= Bathroom =- You arrive in a bathroom. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building. You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a toilet. The toilet is white. But there isn't a thing on it. Hm. Oh well There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, there is no door. > -= Bathroom =-0/1

next_state: -= Kitchen =- You have entered the most standard of all possible kitchens. You can make out an opened fridge. The fridge contains a roasted white onion, an orange bell pepper, a lettuce, a red bell pepper, a raw white tuna, a yellow onion, a carrot and a cilantro. You can make out an oven. The light flickers for a second, but nothing else happens. You make out a table. The table is massive. On the table you can make out a cookbook and a knife. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it. You make out a counter. The counter is vast. On the counter you make out a roasted yellow potato, a green apple, a raw red potato, a yellow bell pepper and a raw purple potato. You make out a stove. The stove appears to be empty. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it? There is an open frosted-glass door leading east. You need an exit without a door? You should try going south. > -= Kitchen =-0/5
